collectGuardianSignaturesOnRecoveryReque.details: Will collect the guardians signatures on the account's active recovery request

params.recoveryReqSignature: The signature of the guardian on the account's active recovery req.

generateRecoveryRequest().details: This function is used to generate the account recovery request. Only verified account guardians can call this function.

getRecoveryRequest().details: Retrieve the account's recovery request, if exists. Only verified account guardians can call this function.

restorePrivateKey().details: Will restore the private key, encrypt and return/email the user

storePrivateKeyShards(uint8[][]).details: Will be used to store the shards of user's private key in a secure cloud based storage of the user.

params.privateKeyShards: Array of private key shards of the user's account

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Mismatch between no. of shards & account guardians"

arguments.value: Mismatch between no. of shards & account guardians

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Mismatch between no. of shards & account guardians"

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Account Recovery Concensus has to be achieved!"

arguments.value: Account Recovery Concensus has to be achieved!

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Account Recovery Concensus has to be achieved!"

documentation.text:
@dev Will contain the evaluation logic for concensus of account recovery request by the guardians
 @return Boolean flag indicating if the concensus on account recovery was achieved or not
